a1: The OCR engine supports English, Italian, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Japanese, and Korean. Select the appropriate language for best results.
q2: Can I OCR both PDFs and images?
a2: Yes! You can process PDF files (each page is rendered and analyzed) or image files directly (JPG, PNG, WebP, BMP, TIFF).
a3: All processing happens in your browser using Tesseract.js. Your files never leave your device.
